labfolder 
labfolder is an electronic laboratory notebook (ELN) solution designed for scientists by scientists to record, integrate and manage experimental research data. With this ELN software researchers can handle the scientific documentation effortlessly with a lot of support for compliance with academic standards.
 
For Max Planck researchers there are two usage scenarios: labfolder can be set up as a service locally (currently available at twelve institutes), or all Max Planck researchers can use a central MPG labfolder solution provided by Max Planck Digital Library (MPDL), with data storage at GWDG Göttingen.
 

 

Features of labfolder include:

  • Importing data from other formats (Word, Excel) and data export (pdf, xhtml)
  • Visualization and annotation of images
  • Remote Internet access to data
  • Team collaboration: administrator roles for project and sub-projects, discussing data and assigning tasks to group members
  • Full Audit Trail: any changes made to an entry are recorded, stored, timestamped, and accessible in a version history
  • Compliance with numerous laboratory standards
